document_data.name: Company of the Wolf
document_data.mainbody:
{{otheruses4|adventuring company|the mercenary group|Company of the Wolf (mercenary group)}}
The '''Company of the Wolf''' was an [[adventuring company]] based out of [[Nesmé]] in the [[Evermoors]]. They were expert woodsmen, trackers and archers, and often fought [[orcs]] and wild beasts of the forests. They also guided and guarded [[merchant]] caravans to and from the [[Sword Coast]] and points south and the northern cities of [[Silverymoon]] and [[Sundabar]]. They bore no relation to the [[mercenary]] band of the [[Company of the Wolf (mercenary group)|same name]].
document_data.Members: As of [[1357 DR]], the company's leader was unknown. Their spokesman was the aged witch [[Umlatha]] of Nesmé.
